original_text: Now Absalom happened to meet David’s men. He was riding his mule, and as the mule went under the thick branches of a large oak, Absalom’s hair got caught in the tree. He was left hanging in midair, while the mule he was riding kept on going.
korean_text: 압살롬이 다윗의 부하들과 마주치니라 압살롬이 노새를 탔는데 그 노새가 큰 상수리나무 번성한 가지 아래로 지날 때에 압살롬의 머리가 그 상수리나무에 걸리매 그가 공중에 달리고 그가 탔던 노새는 그 땅과 공중 사이로 빠져나간지라

sentences.original_text: Now Absalom happened to meet David's men.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 압살롬은 다윗의 사람들을 만나게 되었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and as the mule went under the thick branches
sentences.korean_translation: 당나귀가 두꺼운 가지 아래로 지나갈 때

sentences.original_text: Absalom's hair got caught in the tree.
He was left hanging in midair,
while the mule he was riding kept on going.
